    • wrapText

      public static String wrapText(String text, int maxWidth)
      This function wraps a string text by adding newlines. Take note that user entered new line characters "\n" does not reset the counter
      Parameters:
      text - The Text to wrap
      maxWidth - The maximum width that a line can have
      Returns:

    • wrapTextColor

      public static String wrapTextColor(String text, int maxWidth)
      This is similar to the wrapText function, but instead it also contain styling information, such as color and italics. This will account implicit newline characters.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to wrap
      maxWidth - Maximum characters in a line.
      Returns:
